pathAssistantSteps.info: • ‘Accepted’ indicates that the proposed artwork or asset has been agreed by donor for donation to QUT.
• ‘Declined’ indicates that the artwork or asset has been lost.

• ‘Identify’ indicates that you have identified a Gift in Kind with a prospective donor.
  • Complete the ‘Donation Summary’ section under the ‘Details’ tab by updating the ‘Asset Name/Title’, and ‘Asset Type’ fields. Other fields are pre-populated; however, may be updated.
  • Use ‘Notes’ to record relevant information to help you manage the donation. Use the ‘Activity’ panel to record your interactions and track tasks.
  • Record the documents that have been created with links to where they are stored under the 'Documents’ tab.
• ‘Received’ indicates that the artwork or asset has been received by QUT.
